definition: to control/to accuse/to charge/to sue/to invert a container to empty it/(suffix) (slang) buff/enthusiast/devotee/-phile or -philia

chuan2 shu1 kong4 zhi4 xie2 ding4

definition: ground control (of airborne or space operation)

pinyin: mei2 ti3 fang3 wen4 kong4 zhi4

definition: Line of Actual Control (LAC), separating Indian-controlled territory from Chinese-controlled territory

pinyin: dao3 dan4 wu3 qi4 ji4 shu4 kong4 zhi4 zhi4 du4
containing_words.word: 導彈武器技術控制制度

sentences.english: Fiber will also help regulate the appearance of cellulite.
sentences.chinese: 纖維也會幫助控制脂肪團的形成。

sentences.english: Therefore the algorithm can effectively control the bandwidth occupation of non-response flow.
sentences.chinese: 這將有效的控制非響應流對帶寬的佔用。

sentences.english: The Console should indicate that both subscribers received a copy of the message.
sentences.chinese: 控制檯應該指示兩個訂戶均收到了該消息的複本。

sentences.english: Permissions will be controlled by a business manager or IT administrator.
sentences.chinese: 權限將由業務經理或IT管理員控制。

sentences.english: The semi-duplex work form was adopted between suspending gap sensor and control…
sentences.chinese: 而懸浮間隙傳感器和控制器間則採用半雙工方式工作。

sentences.english: The results indicated that interfacial charge transfer may be the rate limiting step.
sentences.chinese: 分析表明界面的電荷轉移是反應的速度控制步。

sentences.english: This time on the need to install streetlights, but also how streetlight control?
sentences.chinese: 這個時候就需要安裝路燈，可是路燈又要怎麼控制？

sentences.english: Thailand, Malaysia and the Philippines are considering new price controls or subsidies.
sentences.chinese: 泰國，馬來西亞以及菲律賓都在考慮價格控制和補貼。

sentences.english: In my opinion, the number of private cars should be put under control.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲，應該控制私家車的數量。

sentences.english: The machine is controlled by micro-computer, and it adopts stepping motor to feed materials.
sentences.chinese: 本機採用微機電腦控制，步進電機拖料。

sentences.english: The dosages of two drugs were adjusted according to blood pressure change.
sentences.chinese: 根據血壓控制情況調整兩組的降壓藥劑量。

sentences.english: Cold store is used to control temperature of strawberry.
sentences.chinese: 控制溫度一般通過冷藏庫實現。

sentences.english: The fact that you have control over all the clients helps.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，你能夠控制所有客戶的話是很有幫助的。

sentences.english: The current-loop is a key subsystem of the magnetic levitation controller on maglev vehicle.
sentences.chinese: 電流環是磁浮列車懸浮控制器的重要子系統。

sentences.english: Installed with proportional deviation display thermostat, to control temperature accurately.
sentences.chinese: 採用比例式偏差指示溫控器，可精確控制溫度。

definition: matching/fitting in with/compatible with/to correspond/to fit/to conform to/rapport/to coordinate with/to act in concert with/to cooperate/to become man and wife/to combine parts of machine
to grasp (often fig.)/to control/to seize (initiative, opportunity, destiny)/to master/to know well/to understand sth well and know how to use it/fluency
to adjust/to regulate/to harmonize/to reconcile (accountancy etc)
